Business Service

AZSA Health Insurance Society Cafeteria Plan

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

This is about AZSA Health Insurance Society Cafeteria Plan.

Cafeteria Points

40,000 points (= ¥40,000) per yearAbove point will be added if you login cafeteria site and answer the questionnaire after April 1st.*In the case of joining the company after April , points are prorated based on the remaining months until the end of the fiscal year (March).

Points are valid for 2 years

Refer to the Website (Azusa health Insurance Society) for details.

​​​​​​​Cafeteria Plan website

Choose services from a menu of options

Accessible from your home computer 24/7

Register on the website!

Please use Chrome for registering from internal network.

Initial setting 初期登録手続きはこちらから

How to register/ Cafeteria Plan Manual

1. click “パスワードを忘れた方"

If you forget user ID or password,

1. click “パスワードを忘れた方"

2. Input registered e-mail address and click orange button.

In case you forgot registered e-mail address. Click blue button and go to #3

3.Fill in the following form and click orange button.

Business Service

Add/Claim Dependent

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

Overview

Add Dependent

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On Demand

Procedure Detail

1. Submit the application on PIMS.

人事関連書類申請 - Application Forms->各種申請 - Change / Reissue->ご家族に異動があった方の手続き→家族新規登録

Select各種申請　Change/Remove

Select ご家族に移動があった方の手続き

Select 家族新規登録

2. Submit the following documents (attached below in Japanese only)  to HR Management.

​​​​​​​▼For health Insurance

"Dependent change form" (被扶養者異動届兼調書).　＊Common

Additional doumets  *See the Documents to attach for dependent certification 添付書類一覧  (depends on each situation) . for necessary documents *some needs to be original (English samples of some document are available at below "Template")

In case dependent(s) not being Japanese nationality, Residence certificate (Original) indicating all independent(s) as additional document.

▼For pension for spouse

"National pension form for class 3 insured persons" (国民年金第３号被保険者関係届), with pension book (年金手帳）or Basic pension number notification card (基礎年金番号通知書）  attached if name has not changed upon marriage.

Application for ID number (個人番号申請) and power of attorney (委任状), with copy of My Number identification card attached online (PIMS)

【Where to turn in the documents】

For review, please send Files to HR via email first before posting Original documents just in case.  Please refer to How to turn in document to HR Management.

3. Register your dependents' Individual Number ("MyNumber" 個人番号) through PIMS .

Once step 1 is approved, you will be able to register this information through PIMS.Click "Change / Reissue" → "その他申請" (Other application) to access the form.

4. When the number of your dependents changes, you will need to correct the "Declaration of exemption for dependents" form (扶養控除申告書) when filing your year-end tax adjustment 年末調整.

For new born baby, please refer to Procedure of childbirth

For new spouse, please refer to Marriage registration ​​​​​​​

【Your relative may be qualified as your dependent if his or her income meets the following criteria】

※Note that social insurance and tax eligibility criteria are different

<Health insurance/National pension (spouse only)>

Anticipated annual income regardless of type of income (salary, pension, unemployment, interest, etc.) must meet these conditions:

Under 60: less than 1,300,000 yen

60 and older, or with disability: less than 1,800,000 yen

The Health Insurance Society will consider other factors such as whether there is a primary provider ⇒ Refer to  family membership, from Azusa health insurance society

Also Required document (depends on each situation )  Documents to attach for dependent certification

<Income tax>

Amount of income from 1 January to 31 December must meet these conditions:

Salary income only: 1,030,000 yen or less

title: Add_Claim Dependent
content:
Under 60: less than 1,300,000 yen

60 and older, or with disability: less than 1,800,000 yen

The Health Insurance Society will consider other factors such as whether there is a primary provider ⇒ Refer to  family membership, from Azusa health insurance society

Also Required document (depends on each situation )  Documents to attach for dependent certification

<Income tax>

Amount of income from 1 January to 31 December must meet these conditions:

Salary income only: 1,030,000 yen or less

Pension income only: (if under 65) 1,080,000 yen or less; (if 65 and older) 1,580,000 yen or less

<Those who has dependents recently arrived Japan as RESIDENT >

Please submit Application form for dependent and pledge 扶養申立書兼誓約書* both file and original  instead of certifiate issued in Japan to prove dependents income in Japan or tax exemption certificate.

Reference   Requried document Azusa Health Insurance Society)

Notification of Health Insurance Dependent (Change)/Survey Form 被扶養者異動届兼調書 (sample in different sheet).​​​​​​​Dependency notice 扶養理由書.pdf【Sample】Dependency notice 扶養理由書記入見本.pdf Application form for dependent and pledge扶養申立書兼誓約書　*in case it is not possible to prepare certiifcates for income /tax exemption in Japan. ( in case dependents arrive Japan later than your joining date to KIT) National Pension form for category 3 insured persons_国民年金第3号被保険者関係届【Sample】National Pension form for category 3 insured persons_国民年金第3号被保険者関係届記入見本Power of Attorney (国民年金第3号被保険者委任状）​​​​​​​Sample of Power of Attorney (国民年金第3号被保険者委任状）

Tips: If you face error to open PIMS  such as SPNEGO認証 when use MacBook, please change browser to SAFARI. or contact KIT ITS.

List properties

This web part is connected to 

KIT BD project codes.

Select an item in 

KIT BD project codes to view it here.

BD code how-to section expanded

BD code how-to

1) How to create new BD code

Product Owner (PO) is responsible to collect required information and submit the request to finance team. If the PO is not Manger rank or higher, please talk to OU head to ask someone to submit the creation request.

Read this page for BD code details, and identify the required information of the new BD code (Budget type, Decision tree, etc.)

Ask the engagement partner to confirm the information is correct.

Go to KIT BD project codes page and create new item. Make sure that Status is Creation Requested.

After the new item is successfully created, Finance team create a new BD code record in IBS system.

Finance team notifies to the PO when the requested BD code is available. Use the Teams channel JP - KIT-Finance / BD Code Requests (private channel)

The new BD becomes effective after the engagement partner approves in IBS system, then Status of the list item goes to "Active".

Optionally PO can use Charge start date filed to instruct project members from when they can start charging workhours to this BD code. Typically charge start date is the date of Start Gate event.

2) How to close BD code

When BD codes are no longer used (for instance releasing the product, end of life of the operating product), PO should close the BD code in order for project members to mischarge to unused BD codes.

PO can use Charge end date filed to instruct project members until when they can charge workhours to this BD code. Typically charge end date is the date of Release Gate event.

Go to KIT BD project codes page and locate the BD code to be closed. PO-filtered BD codes view helps you to show all BD codes assigned to you. Update Status to Closing Requested.

Finance team notifies to the PO when the BD code is successfully closed. Use the Teams channel JP - KIT-Finance​​​​​​​ / BD Code Requests (private channel).

3) How to rename/transfer existing BD code

If PO finds misinformation in KIT BD project codes, do not hesitate to contact Finance team to correct information. The situation will include

The project name is changed

The project is moved to different program

PO is changed due to new assignment

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

Domestic Trip

Preparing

1.Check Safety

Before you can request approval for a business trip, you must check the information posted on the websites under this section regarding safety and health risks at your travel destination(s).

Travel Agency

Policy

Approver

Note

MO Tourist

Travel Expense Policy

Need approval via Concur "Request" with the quote from MO Tourist.
Add KIT GA (Akiko, Yamazaki or Natsuki, Iwai)as the first approver.

Follow Approval Rules

・GA needs approval number of your Concur "Request".
・If you did't add GA as the first approver on your request, GA may ask approval number.

Per diem is not provided when the purpose of the business trip is participating in training.

By rule, must use economy class when traveling overseas to participate in training.

general info

CPA Corporate Pension Fund

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

CPA Corporate Pension Fund

KIT doesn’t have Defined-Contribution Pension plan.

KIT employees enroll in CPA Corporate Pension Fund (Defined-BenefitCorporatePension).

CPA Corporate Pension Fund does not accept external pension assets.

Please refer to here (only in Japanese) for details of CPA Corporate Pension Fund

If you would like to enroll in individual-type defined-contribution pension plan( iDeCo), please refer to 個人型確定拠出年金 (iDeCo) Individual-type defined-contribution pension plan

1. How to check your ID number of Certified Public Accountants’ Corporate Pension Fund Certificate (公認会計士企業年金基金の加入者番号通知書)　 section expanded

1. How to check your ID number of Certified Public Accountants’ Corporate Pension Fund Certificate (公認会計士企業年金基金の加入者番号通知書)

As a general rule, they were either

1  Distributed from HR Management after on-boarding (those who joined KIT May 2020 or before)*1 ,  or

2 Uploaded /available at PIMS (those who joined KIT June 2020 later).   Hence if you have not received paper base certificate, please refer to PIMS “ファイル照会＞公文書＞「egov_********(←8digits Personal No )」as below image

PIMS  　Check from PIMS

1  Those who joined KIT May 2020 or before, if you can not find it or not sure about the certificate (paper), HR Management can provide your number upon request, or advise re-issuing procedure.  Please note that it takes approx. 1 month upon request form submission.  If you joined KIT May 2020 or before, and re-issuing required prior to resignation, consider its lead time .

Individual Inforamtion  個人情報照会 on PIMS

Your ID number can be also checked through page at PIMS, Hypothetical Pension Fund Balance Point as well　（updated once a year, around Sep. ).

Pleaes go to PIMS, then refer to 個人情報照会 - Individual Information＞企業年金基金ｷｬｯｼｭﾊﾞﾗﾝｽﾌﾟﾗﾝ仮想残高 as below.

Image of 照会-Inquiry in PIMS

PIMS ：企業年金基金ｷｬｯｼｭﾊﾞﾗﾝｽﾌﾟﾗﾝ仮想残高
ﾎﾟｲﾝﾄのお知らせ - Hypothetical Pension Fund Balance Point

Enlarged image. Click above Hypothetical Pension Fund Blance Point to check your balance, 　（Updated around September of each year )

2. Subsidy for use of accomodation facilities section expanded

2. Subsidy for use of accomodation facilities

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​【If you use one of its contracted facilities, the Certified Public Accountants' Corporate Pension Fund will subsidize the cost】

​​​​​​​In order to promote the welfare of its enrollees, pensioners, and accompanying family, the Fund pays a subsidy to cover up to

three (3) nights per year (April-March) that you (the enrollee/pension recipient) and one accompanying member of your family stays

at a JTB, Kinki Nippon Tourist, or other accomodation facility contracted with the Fund.

title: CPA Corporate Pension Fund
content:
​​​​​​​In order to promote the welfare of its enrollees, pensioners, and accompanying family, the Fund pays a subsidy to cover up to

three (3) nights per year (April-March) that you (the enrollee/pension recipient) and one accompanying member of your family stays

at a JTB, Kinki Nippon Tourist, or other accomodation facility contracted with the Fund.

See their website (Japanese only) for details about the facilities and application procedures (in Japanese only).

3. Condolence payment section expanded

3. Condolence payment

If the enrollee passes away, a condolence payment will be made to his or her surviving family.

[ Payment amount ]

The amount differs depending on the number of years enrolled in the Fund.

Enrollment period

Less than 5 years

5 - 9 years

10 years or more

Condolence payment

30,000  yen

50,000 yen

100,000 yen

Fill out the form and submit it to HR management.

Please send file via e-mail, to (not via microsoft teams) to  JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com>

4. Marriage congratulatory cash gift section expanded

4. Marriage congratulatory cash gift

[This benefit is provided when ]

An enrollee (minimum 1 year) gets married

A female enrollee (minimum 1 year) gets married within 3 months of resigning from the firm.

[ Gift amount ]10,000 yen.

[ How to apply ]

Fill out  the application Application form for cash gift 結婚祝金請求書​​​​​​​ (available in Japanese only) and turn it in to HR Management.

Please send file via e-mail, to (not via microsoft teams) to  JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com>

Please refer to here for checking "加入者番号" you should fill out in the form is your number in Corporation pension fund .

5. Child birth cash gift section expanded

5. Child birth cash gift

[This benefit is provided when ]

An enrollee (minimum 1 year) gives birth to a child.

A spouse of enrollee (minimum 1 year) gives birth to a child.

[ Gift amount ]

10,000 yen.

[ How to apply ]

Fill out  the application form (available in Japanese only) and turn it in to HR Management.

Please send file via e-mail, to (not via microsoft teams) to  JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com>

Please refer to here for checking "加入者番号" you should fill out in the form is your number in Corporation pension fund .

6. One time orphan's allowance section expanded

6. One time orphan's allowance

[Conditions for payment ]The deceased had been enrolled in the Fund for one (1) year or more, and had been supporting a child under 18 years of age at the time of death.The payment will be made to the spouse of the enrollee who is raising the child.

[Payment amount]100,000 yen

Fill out the form  and submit it to HR management.

Please send file via e-mail, to (not via microsoft teams) to  JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com>

7. Request for Reissuing your pension enrollment notification letter if you had been received it after joining KIT before. 　年金基金加入通知書再交付　　 section expanded

Notes

1. Amount provided to each individual (if both parties to marriage are Partners, or employees of KIT).

“Marriage” in these Rules shall refer to the following items:

1)Registered marriage or a wedding ceremony

2)Common-law marriage (sharing a household with a legally undeclared wife or husband)

3)Same-sex marriage (holding a wedding ceremony with a same-sex partner, or mutual recognition of the marriage relationship)

2. Amount provided per birth (not per individual if both parents are Partners or employees of KIT). In the case of stillbirth or death of child within 1 week from birth, koden (money offering) shall be provided without payment of congratulatory cash gift for birth.

3. Family qualifications and order of recipients shall be follow provisions of the Ordinance for Enforcement of the Labor Standards Act.

4. “Spouse” in Figure 1 of these Rules refers to a partner of a marriage defined in Note 1.

5. Includes adoptive parents of the Partner or employee.

6. “Child” refers to a biological or adopted child of the Partner or employee, and does not include children who have been given away for adoption by another family.

7. Does not include spouse’s relatives (relatives-in-law).

8. For conditions that require hospitalization for 1 week or longer, or a medical treatment/recuperation period of 1 month or longer.

9. Applicable when a Partner or employee’s current residence sustains damage due to fire, earthquake, or wind and water-related disaster, decided after the actual extent of damage has been investigated.

Business service

Dual Work Approval

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

1. Over view section expanded

1. Over view

Dual work

2. Occurrence Time/ Frequency section expanded

2. Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On demand

3. Procedure Detail section expanded

3. Procedure Detail

①　Use Sentinel to check independence and conflict of interest (How to use Sentinel)

②　If the result of Sentinel was restricted entity, register/post on Independence DB and check safe guard.（KJ Flow）

If the result was not restricted entity , skip this and go to ③

③　Get approval from Division Head and Lob Partner by email. (There is no set format for this email)

④　After getting approval from ③, get approval from RMP

Please fill in the following and send an email to RMP.

件名 / Title　兼業（二重就業）の審査をお願いいたします。Please proceed the inspection for Dual work (double employment).

氏名 / Name

ランク / Rank

所属 / OU

兼業先名称 / Name of your second business

【添付資料 Required Documents】

※下記5点をメールに添付して、お送りください。 Please attach 5 documents listed below to email.

二重就業承認申請書 Dual work application form

独立性確認を証明する資料 Document to prove independence check

OU長承認メール Approve email from OU Head

Division長承認メール Approve email from Division Head

兼業先の事業内容がわかる資料 Document that explains the business of your second business

⑤　After getting approval ④, get approval from HR Partner（use the same email format as ④）

⑥　Check independence on July every year and report to HR Labor

※See the flow for further details.

4. Guideline section expanded

4. Guideline

■ KIT Dual work guidelines

Principle

KIT is a subsidiary of Azusa(あずさ監査法人), and differs from other ordinary business companies in terms of independence. Employees of KIT are only permitted to apply for the following three conditions for application / approval for secondary employment.

Adviser or board member of asset management company consisting of their relatives

Directors and advisors of local community related organizations and NPOs

In case you give a lecturer at a university etc. from an individual's point of view (one-off, free of charge or reward for transportation expenses)             ※ In any case above, it is a requirement that there is no “employment” with the secondary business.

Exception

When not satisfying the requirements of the above principle but expecting a beneficial effect on KIT or KPMG

⇒ We will conclude a "Consignment Agreement" between KIT and secondary employment, provide services as "KIT employee", and consider how to take the form of compensation paid to KIT. (Example: In the case of receiving regular rewards in lecturer work etc.) ⇒ If the above method is not possible or if there is a compelling reason, we will consult at the management meeting and judge whether it is possible or not individually.

■Related Rules and Policies

Work Rules

Article 18:General rule of conduct

In addition to complying with the guidelines for conduct laid out in these Rules, Employees must obey work orders, dedicate themselves to their duties, strive to improve their work abilities, and cooperate with others to support the maintenance of order within the workplace.

Article 19:Guidelines for conduct

title: Dual Work Approval
content:
■Related Rules and Policies

Work Rules

Article 18:General rule of conduct

In addition to complying with the guidelines for conduct laid out in these Rules, Employees must obey work orders, dedicate themselves to their duties, strive to improve their work abilities, and cooperate with others to support the maintenance of order within the workplace.

Article 19:Guidelines for conduct

(11) Do not engage in work for wages other than work with KIT without receiving an order or approval to do so from KIT.

Article 21: Relationships of interest and side businesses

If an Employee develops a relationship of interest (financial, personal, etc.), or the possibility of such a relationship with a client arises, the Employee must promptly notify each division head in writing and gain approval. Rules regulating relationships of interest shall apply as stipulated by the KPMG Japan Management Group.

2. As a rule, Employees shall not engage in a side business, in order to be able to concentrate on work at KIT. However, this shall not apply in some exceptional cases where there is the express approval of KIT.

Discipline Regulations on Independence and Ethics​​​​​​​　独立性に関する紀律規程

Article 31 (Prohibition of Subsidiary Business) Members shall not assume or take office as officers, etc. of guarantee business clients. They shall also: No person shall assume office as an Officer, etc. of any Juridical Person, etc., except in the following cases:.

( 1 ) When assuming office as an officer, etc. of a nonprofit organization or a juridical person, etc. established for personal family reasons

( 2 ) Cases where a Designated Custodian is appointed in Trustee Services and becomes a Trustee

パートナー規程

Article 11(Prohibited Matters)

The partner may not:(1) conduct business or hold any other post concurrently, without the consent of the Company;

Expenses

JP-FM KIT-BO

FM

Expenses（Concur）

Information about applying for expense reimbursement

Procedure Detail section expanded

Procedure Detail

1、Input data from the input screen.（Concur）

2.KIT Approval Rules Obtain approval and proceed with the process based on

（Prior application is required except for commuting transportation expenses (small amount).）

3、Enter the application details, charge code, and other necessary information and submit the application (prior application is required except for commuting transportation expenses, etc.)　Please refer to the manual for details（Manual)

①Click “Create New Report” or “Not Submitted Report” on Manage Expenses page.

②Concur shows the screen to enter the Header information relating to the new Expense Report.Enter [the month of application] to “Report Date, Report Name”, tick [NO] for “Claim Travel Allowance”, and then click “Create Report”.

③The screen shows the details of Expense Entry. Click “Add Expense”.

④You will need to enter the details of Expense Entry on this screen. Required fields differ depending on the expense type.

The cost code defaults to 24808001. Please correct this to the appropriate code.

⑤Make sure the approver is the partner in charge on the report timeline.

⑥Agree and submit

4．Approver reviews application 2 and approves/reverts.

5．Revise the returned application and submit a new submition.

Guideline section expanded

Guideline

1．Paper reports and receipts are not required for Conquer expense applications except in special circumstances.

2．Please import receipts and enter expense reimbursement information each time an expense payment is made.Submission is done on a report basis. Please submit expense reports for one month by the designated date and submit them on Concur.

3．Please use the iPhone Conquer application mainly for "importing receipt data/information" and "approval" and apply for expense reports on your PC.

4．Prior application is required except for commuting and transportation expenses, etc.

5．Paper receipts are generally not required, but please keep receipts for three months after replacement expenses are paid with your salary.

6．Expenses for supplies (including IT equipment) over 200,000 cannot be reimbursed.

7．Submission deadline: 25th of each month (or the day before if it is a holiday) Applications submitted after the 26th will be processed for the following month.

8．Transfer date: Payday of the month following the month of approval

9. If you are applying for a foreign currency receipt in Japanese yen, please attach a statement showing both the foreign currency and Japanese yen (ex/credit card statement).

10.If the settlement (application) amount exceeds 10% of the pre-application amount, the application will not be accepted.

11.When traveling for business trip, please create a single report and obtain approval for all expenses related to the trip (including flight tickets and per diem) in advance.

12.Health check transportation reimbursement is not allowed.　Health-Checkup

＜Commuting Expense ＞

Please select 「030.Public Transporation(manual entry)」.

「010.Transportation(IC prepaid card）」 is an expense type for company IC cards and ICCI and is currently unavailable.

Please select your team's code from the following charge codes for the cost sharing code.

＜Business strip＞

Business Trip(GA)

N Need approval via Concur "Request"・All expenses related to business travel.

P Please start with GA's (Ogasawara-san) approval based on the KIT Approval Matrix.

PlPease attach MO Tourist's quote to your pre-application.

You don't have to settle the flight fee by yourself as MO Tourist will send a bill to KIT, but please add it to your request as a rule

Flight

daily allowance

Buisiness service

Flexible work program

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

1. Overview section expanded

1. Overview

KIT employees can apply for 1) exemption of working hours with a limit of 2 days a week or 2) short working hours with a limit of 2 hours a day in the either of following cases.

are pregnant or have given birth in the past year

are responsible to care for a child who has not yet graduated from elementary school

must provide assistance to a family member in need of care

have other circumstances recognized by KIT

Above ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​does not apply to the following persons

Employees whose prescribed working days are 2 days or less per week

Employees who have been employed by KIT for less than six months

2. Occurrence Time/ Frequency section expanded

2. Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On Demand　(But application starts on 1st day of every month)

Childcare: Multiple times until the child graduates from elementary school

Nursing care：Up to 2 times within 3 years from start date

3.Procedure Detail section expanded

3.Procedure Detail

Get approval from your Division Head and LoB Partner by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head).

Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by 1 month before the start date of the leave.

1) Approval mail of Division head and LoB Partner

2) Application form *

3) Documents to certify the reason of application

Childcare (Pregnant): Photocopy of the certificate of date of birth (due date) of the child

Nursing care: Medical certificate, etc.

Signature is processed via DocuSign

4.Guideline section expanded

4.Guideline

Start date

1st day of each month  *Can not be applied in the middle of month except for just after administrative leaves (i.g. Childcare leave)

Duration

From 1 month to 12 months per application (in 1-month increments)

Frequency

Childcare: Multiple times until the child graduates from elementary schoolNursing care：Up to 2 times within 3 years from start date

Salary

Salary will be reduced depending on the reduced working hours/ days

5.Template section expanded

5.Template

Application form for Flexible work program

Related regulations

buisiness service

Health Checkup

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

1. Over view section expanded

1. Over view

Get yearly health checkup  (Work Rules Chapter 10-53)

2. Occurrence Time/ Frequency section expanded

2. Occurrence Time/ Frequency

Yearly

3. Procedure Detail section expanded

3. Procedure Detail

Please take a health examination once each year (April-March).

Information is available on the AZSA Health Insurance Society website. Use their Health Examination Appointment System to make an appointment.

Please take it within the follwoing period to ensure all employee take it.

Recommended Period

Completion Date

by October 31, 2023

December 31, 2023

Please let KIT-HR Management know if it is difficult to take it by the above date.

Which clinics or hospitals can I use?

Choose from the AZSA Health Insurance Society's list of healthcare institutions (see list).

Please make sure to use clinics or hospitals in the list otherwise you will need to pay the full cost.

What should I do to undergo the checkup?

Check the AZSA Health Insurance Society website to decide which examinations and optional screenings you will undergo.

Make an appointment on the Cafeteria Plan website. Some institutions require you to make an appointment by phone before using the website.

Receive pre-checkup questionnaire and sampling kit (mailed to your home address).

Internal code:0000010061870000    Medical Check (健康診断) )  (Lysthea Quick Manual)

Receive health checkup results (mailed to your home address). HR will also receive your results, which are reviewed by KC's occupational physician.

How should I change or cancel the appointment?

Please contact Value HR customer service

Tel: 0570-075-703 　E-mail: kensin-azsa@apap.jp for date change or cancel of appointment. * They accept English e-mail.

For last minute cancellations or changes, please contact the clinic or hospital directly as well.

Further guidance for English speakers:

How do I register to the Cafeteria Plan website?

How do I make an appointment for the annual health check?

Here is English available Medical Clinic

4. Guideline section expanded

4. Guideline

FAQ

Q: I had a health check when I was hired by the firm. Do I have to do it again?

A: Your results can be used in place of your annual health check if you took it after April 1st. If you wish, you can also undergo the heath insurance society's examination.

Q: Should I pay for the fee of secondary inspection?

A: Yes, you need pay for the secondary inspection which is covered by health insurance.

Q: Should I pay for the fee of secondary inspection?

A: Yes It is at your own expenses.

Q: Is transportation to/from the clinic/hospital for mecdical check up coverd by KIT?

A: No,  transporation is at your own expenses.

Q: Is transporation part of working hours? Also is time home or office to/from clinic work time? 　How to calculate commuting if come to office on medical check up day.

A: No, it is part of commuting time. If you specify, record attendance record as below image, not with internal code. As for transportation, Origin is still your home, not based on linic location

Related regulations

How to take vacation / leave

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

About This PageThis page contains all the relevant information how to take vacation/ leave​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​If you have any questions about this topic, please reach out to the people from< KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com​​​​​​​​ >​​

Procedure detail about take vacation/leave　How to apply KIT2.0 section expanded

Procedure detail about take vacation/leave　How to apply KIT2.0

Flow

1. When you take vacation/leave

<For all KIT members>

1. Applicant : Request vacation/ leave by Teams to the following approver a week prior.　   <Approver> OU Head and Product Owner

For long vacation, request should be made earlier not to impact your team and business.

2. Approver : Confirm the request by Teams　3. Applicant:  Input and submit vacation info in “KIT 2.0 App OOO Schedule" after getting approval from the approver.　4. Input leave category on vacation days in the timesheet of LYSITHEA . *This process #4 is not required for Temp staffs, and Contractors

Be sure to complete the timesheet before taking leaves.

KIT 2.0 App "OOO schedule" do the followings for you. ★Here is the link to KIT 2.0 App support channel.

Post message on Microsoft Teams channel #OOO Schedule*1  (able to mention other KIT members)●Creates OOO schedule on your Outlook calendar●Creates OOO schedule on KIT all Outlook calendar "KIT-OOO" *2

1  ”Short notice” sign will be added to the message if OOO schedule is created after 17:00 on the previous day of start date of OOO

2  Here is the link for setting  KIT-OOO Outlook Calendar

Note: Bringing company loaned IT devices during vacation/ leave are not allowed. For exceptional cases, approval from management is required.

2. Procedure detail about Timesheet

<For only employees>

1. Company holidays / Annual Leave / Refresh Leave

2. Other types of paid leave

3. Recommended PTO days

4. Calendar

Individual-type defined-contribution pension plan (iDeCo)

Please refer to the follwoing site for infomation about iDeCo.

https://www.ideco-koushiki.jp/english/

If you would like to enroll in it, please get an application form from financial institutions and submit "事業主の証明書" to HR Management.

How to turn in Document to HR Management

Please note that it might take time till document(事業主の証明書） returned to you since HR Management members are also working from home mostly .

For Non-Japanese (Procedure in English), inforamtion is limited as this is regarding to Pension lan.  Please refer to Japanese site if you would like to proceed further.  (Clicking above ”翻訳” and select 日本語 in order to refer Japanese page)

当法人の監査対象証券投資信託とその委託会社(Japanese only)   (Spread sheets )

​e-mail：JP-FM KICS (JP-FMKICS@jp.kpmg.com) Tel ：03-3266-7661

available Weekday 9:15～17:15 / but for lunch time

Leave of Absence

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

1. Family care leave section expanded

1. Family care leave

Overview

Can be taken in case family member needs nursing care for 2 weeks or more

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On Demand  Up to 93 days in total and 3 times per caretaker

Procedure Detail

Get approval from your Division Head and LoB Partner by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head).

Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by 2 weeks before the start date of the leave.

1) Approval mail of Division head and LoB Partner

2) Application form *

3) Medical certificate

Signature is processed via DocuSign

3. For familycare leave benefit, send the following documents by start date of the leave

1) Agreement on application for family care leave benefit

2) Photocopy of ATM card

Guideline

Need to submit application form 2 weeks before  requested start date of the leave.Up to 93 days in total and 3 times per caretaker Family care leave allowance will be provided by employment insurance if applicable.

Template

Application For family care leave 介護休業届

Notes

Family care leave allowance will be paidIf you have 12 month or longer insurance period of employment insurance for 2 years before the start date of the Familycare leave.approx. 67% of average salary (Max 335,871 yen/month)

2. Maternity leave section expanded

2. Maternity leave

Overview

Applying for maternity leave

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

From 6 weeks before the expected due date to 8 weeks after the actual delivery date.

Procedure Detail

Get approval from your Division Head and LoB Partner by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head).

Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by 1 month before the start date of the leave.

1) Approval mail of Division head and LoB Partner

2) Application Form *

3) Certificate of child's expected birth date

4) Take over schedule check list  *

Signature is processed via DocuSign

Guideline

Need to apply for 1month before the start date of the leave.Maternity allowance will be provided.

Template

KIT Maternity Leave Application FormTake over schedule check list

3. Childcare leave section expanded

3. Childcare leave

Postnatal childcare leave for father

Overview

Can be taken separately from chidcare leave,  for up to 4 weeks, from within 8 weeks after child birth and up to twice.

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

From expected child's birthday until 8 weeks after the childbirth 
 Up to twice for each child

Procedure Detail

Get approval from your Division Head and LoB Partner by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head).

Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by 2 weeks before the start date of the leave.

1) Approval mail of Division head and LoB Partner

2) Application form *

3) Certificate of child's (expected) birth date

4) Take over schedule check list  *

Signature is processed via DocuSign

3. For childcare leave benefit, send the following documents by start date of the leave

1) Agreement on application for childcare leave benefit

2) Photocopy of ATM card

Guideline

title: Leave of Absence
content:
Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by 2 weeks before the start date of the leave.

1) Approval mail of Division head and LoB Partner

2) Application form *

3) Certificate of child's (expected) birth date

4) Take over schedule check list  *

Signature is processed via DocuSign

3. For childcare leave benefit, send the following documents by start date of the leave

1) Agreement on application for childcare leave benefit

2) Photocopy of ATM card

Guideline

Need to apply for 2 weeks before the start date of the leave.
Need to apply for all at once in case of taking this leave twice
After application, start date of the leave can be moved forward only once per leave before the scheduled date by applying at least 1 week before the scheduled start date.
After application, end date of the leave can be postponed only once per leave by applying at least 2 weeks before the scheduled end date.
Childcare leave benefit will be provided if applicable.

Template

Application form for Post-natal ChidCareLeave 
Take over schedule check list 
Agreement on application for childcare leave benefit

Childcare leave

Overview

Can be taken for up to 1 year* from child's expected birthday until child gets 1 year old (1 year and 2 months of age if the spouse also takes childcare leave)
*including postpartum leave and postnatal childcare leave

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

From child's expected birthday until child gets 1 year old (1 year and 2 months of age if the spouse also takes childcare leave)
 Up to twice for each child

Procedure Detail

Get approval from your Division Head and LoB Partner by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head).

Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com  by 1 month before the start date of the leave. 1) Approval mail of Division Head and LoB Partner

2) Application form *

3) Certificate of child's (expected) birth date

4) Take over schedule check list *

Signature is processed via DocuSign

3. For childcare leave benefit, send the following documents by start date of the leave

1) Agreement on application for childcare leave benefit

2) Photocopy of ATM card

Guideline

Need to apply for at least 1 month before the start date of the leave.
After application, start date of the leave can be moved forward only once per leave in the following cases.1) Birth of a child before the expected date of birth 2) Spouse's death, disease, separation, etc. 
After application, end date of the leave can be changed (both to advance and postpone) only once per leave by applying at least 1 month before the scheduled end date.
Application can be withdrawn by the day before the scheduled start date of Leave. Withdrawal of an application is deemed to have taken the childcare leave once for each withdrawal.
Childcare leave benefit will be provided if applicable.

Template

Application form for Childcare leave
Take over schedule check list 
Agreement on application for childcare leave benefit

4. Injury and sickness leave section expanded

4. Injury and sickness leave

Overview

For employees who need to take leave for more than 2 weeks due to injury or sickness

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

As soon as you consider taking this leave

Procedure Detail

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Consult with your Division Head  and KIT HR KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head) if you would like to take this leave.KIT HR will explain about details and procedure of this leave.

Guideline

Need to submit medical certificate and take an interview with industrial physician before both taking this leave and returning to work.

Template

5. Application of reinstatement after leave of absence section expanded

5. Application of reinstatement after leave of absence

Overview

Reinstatement applicaion is required before returing to work from leave of absence

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

Before return to work from leave of absence

Procedure Detail

​​​​​​​​​​​​​Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by 3 weeks before reinstatement date.1) Application form **Signature is processed via DocuSign

Guideline

Need to submit application form 3 weeks before reinstatement date

Template

Application form for reinstatement

1. Company holidays section expanded

1. Company holidays

Company holidays(Work Rules Chapter 5-1-30)

Saturday

Sunday

Japanese public holidays

Year-end & New Year Holiday (December 29 – January 4)

KPMG Japan Establishment Day (July 1) (Exact date changes each year)

Saturday, July 1st is company holiday for 2023  *No substitute holiday is set even it falls on Saturday.

2. Annual Leave / Refresh Leave section expanded

2. Annual Leave / Refresh Leave

Annual Leave / Refresh Leave (Work Rules Chapter 5-2) ​​​​​​​

Type of PTO

Annual Leave

Refresh Leave

Accure on

1 July

1 July

Valid for

2 years

2 years

Number of Days

Depends on timing of joining firm & length of tenure (max 20 days)

5 days(2 days during 1st year if joining firm between Oct-Jun)

Can be used increments of

Full day (7 Hours)*Only Flextime employees can take Half day (3.5 Hours) bases.

Full day (7 Hours) only (consecutive days as much as possible)

3. Other types of paid leave  section expanded

3. Other types of paid leave

Other types of paid leave  (Work Rules Chapter 5-2, 3)

Time off in Lieu  (Alternative day off )

Article 33: Work on days off and alternative days off Details page-15

If you work on company holidays, you are entitled to take Time Off in Lieu for the hours you worked on holidays.

OU Head's pre-approval is required for working on holidays.

Work form

Managerial work

Discretionary work
Flex time
Hourly

Period of use

Can be taken anytime after the day you worked on holidays.

Shold be taken within the same month and after the day you worked on holidays.

*In case unable to take Time off in Lieu within the same month, 100% of hourly salary shall be paid additionally for hours not used as Time Off in Lieu.

Carry over

Can be carried over without limit until end of September and up to 70h to the following year starting from Oct 1st.

Can't be carried over to the following month

Procedure  Detail

Get approval from OU head for working on holidays.
Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave

Notes

For lysithea, select "代休取得/Time Off in Lieu” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu.

Marriage leave

Find the details in Work rule article 42

Duration

Max 5 days

Regulation/ Condition

To be taken between 1 monthbefore the marriage* and 12 months after the marriage*

Procedure  Detail

Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave
 Contact HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com before the leave

Notes

“Marriage” here refer to the following items

1)Registered marriage or wedding ceremony
2)Common-law marriage (sharing a household with a legally undeclared wife or husband)
3)Same-sex marriage (holding a wedding ceremony with a same-sex partner, or mutual recognition of the marriage relationship)

HR Management might ask to submit the documents to confim the date of marriage.
For lysithea, select "結婚休暇/Marriage leave” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu.

Spouse's child birth Leave

Please contact HR management in advance,and find the Details page-18

Duration

Max 3days

Regulation/ Condition

Childbirth by spouse (within 2 weeks before/after the childbirth)

Please contact HR management in advance,and find the Details　page-18

Regulation/ Condition

(i) Death of parent, spouse, or child – Max 7days(ii) Death of grandparent (does not include spouse’s grandparent) – Max 3days(iii) Death of sibling, grandchild, or spouse’s parent – Max 3days(iv)Death ofspouse’ssibling –Max 3days(v) Death of other cohabiting relative – Max 2days(vi) Death of uncle or aunt (does not include spouse’suncle or aunt) – Max 1day

Procedure Detail

Submit the form Condolence info　弔事報告

Days off during the bereavement period will be counted as condolence bereavement period.
If travel is necessary for bereavement (wake, funeral, etc.), the bereavement period shall be extended by the number of days necessary for travel.
For lysithea, select "忌服・忌引休暇/Funeral leave” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu

On Demand
1Day / year (starting from April 1st to March 31st in the following year)

Fill in the Application form

Get approval from Division Head by e-mail (make sure to CCing OU Head) attaching filled appplication form (#1) .

Send the following documents by e-mail to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by1 week before the leave.

1) Application form*

2) Approval mail of Division head

4. Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave

5. Send Volunteer report* to DIvision Head and HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com within 2 weeks after the leave.

Signature is processed via DocuSign

See voluteer leave rule (Japanese) for the detail

On Demand

Special Leave for maternity guidances and checkups

Employees who are pregnant allowed to take leaves for necessary hours to take health guidance or health checkups under the provisions of the Maternal and Child Health Act

Duration/ Frequency

title: List of Vacation_ Leave
content:
1) Approval mail of Division head
2) Application form*
　　3. Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave

Template

Application form

Notes

For lysithea, select "裁判員等休暇/Lay judge system” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu

Special Leave for maternity guidances and checkups

Regulation/ Condition

Employees who are pregnant allowed to take leaves for necessary hours to take health guidance or health checkups under the provisions of the Maternal and Child Health Act

Duration/ Frequency

Up to one day (7 hours) at a time within the following limits are paid, for the portion exceeding the following limits are unpaid.(1) Once every 4 weeks until 23rd weeks of pregnancy
(2) Once every 2 weeks between the 24th and 35th weeks of pregnancy
(3) Once a week between the 36th week of pregnancy and childbirth
(4) When a physician, etc. gives instructions different from (1) to (3), the instructions shall be followed.
(5) After delivery, under the instructions of a physician, etc.

Procedure Detail

Send an e-mail with the following information to HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com by the day before.

   (1)Date (2) Required hours (3) Name of medical institution (4) Number of weeks of pregnancy
      2. Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave
      3. Input Lysithea as follows

4. Unpaid Leave section expanded

4. Unpaid Leave

Sick Leave

KIT doesn't have Sick leave, so please take Annual leave or Refresh leave when you are sick.

In case you need to take leave for more than 2 weeks, please refer to Injury and sickness leave

Sick/ injured childcare leave

Duration

Necessary period

Regulation / Condition

In case pre-elementary school child requires caregiving due to injury or illness, or receiving an immunization or health checkup.

Procedure Detail

Contact HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com before the leave

Notes

For lysithea, select "子の看護休暇/Childnurse/unpaid” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu

Family nursing care Leave

Duration

Necessary period

Regulation / Condition

In case of need for caregiving of family member who is in a state that requires care or nursing  as follows:

Accompany the family member to a medical institution,
Complete procedures for nursing services on the family member’s behalf, etc

Procedure datail

Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave
Contact HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com before the leave

Notes

For lysithea, select "介護/Family care/unpaid” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu

Menstruation Leave

Duration

Necessary period

Regulation / Condition

In case a female Employee is difficult to work particularly due to menstruation

Procedure detail

Follow the Procedure detail about take vacation/leave
Contact HR Management KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com before the leave

Notes

For lysithea, select "妊健_生理_1歳未育/Female/unpaid” in Break/Leave/Other column or Multiple days of leave menu

5. Recommended PTO days section expanded

5. Recommended PTO days

“Recommended PTO days” is set to encourage employees to take PTOs as planned and it leads to meet the requirement by Labor Standard Act*.

Please take advantage of these Recommended PTO days when you plan your PTO.

KIT set recommended PTO days in order to encourage employees to take PTO. (PTO=Paid Time Off)

Basically, it is set at Obon week, year-end & new year holidays and between holiday and holiday.

Recommended PTO days are not set during AZSA’s busy audit season (mid-January to mid-March and early-April to mid-June).  If you take PTO during this period, you need to take care not to affect your work related to AZSA’s audit work.

Recommended PTO days are days recommended, not required, to take time off.  When you take PTO on Recommended PTO days, you need to plan not to interfere with your work.

Labor Standards Act requires all employees who are granted 10 days of annual leaves or more to take at least five days of paid time off (PTO) per year.

6. How to check my remaining days of leave section expanded

6. How to check my remaining days of leave

title: List of Vacation_ Leave
content:
Recommended PTO days are days recommended, not required, to take time off.  When you take PTO on Recommended PTO days, you need to plan not to interfere with your work.

Labor Standards Act requires all employees who are granted 10 days of annual leaves or more to take at least five days of paid time off (PTO) per year.

6. How to check my remaining days of leave section expanded

6. How to check my remaining days of leave

Please refer to Lysithea, left side menu as below

Sample of Annual leave,  Refresh vacation

Expiration

Carried over Leave :　End of current Fiscal Year

Accrued leave :   End of next Fiscal year

For refresh leave, please note that up to 5 days can be carried over to next year.Both leaves can be carried over only one more year and June 30th is the end of year. So current Carry-overs will expire June 30th 2023.Unfortunately, IBS is not available for checking leave balance any more.

Refresh leaves carried over days is 1-5 days shown number is 6-10  (i.e. 10-5=5 MAX), these leave is valid untill June 30th 2023.

For Intern, all paid leave have been for whole duration of contract period, so no additional days(AL nor RV) accruied on July 1st.

Pregnancy and Childbirth

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

This page is about procedures, leaves, allowances, relevant to Pregnancy and Childbirth

1. Report to HR as soon as you know your or your spouse’s pregnancy or childbirth section expanded

1. Report to HR as soon as you know your or your spouse’s pregnancy or childbirth

Please report to HR Management via the Forms below, as soon as you know  your or your spouse’s pregnancy or childbirth.

In order to encourage employees to take childcare leave, KIT provides information on childcare leave to all employees who are aware of pregnancy or childbirth of the employees or their spouse, and confirm their intention to take childcare leave.

2. Leaves and Flexible work program section expanded

2. Leaves and Flexible work program

Special Leave for maternity guidances and checkups

Please refer to Special Leave for maternity guidances and checkups

Maternity leave

Please refer to Maternity leave.

Spouse’s child birth leave

Please refer to Spouse’s child birth leave

Childcare leave

Please refer to Childcare leave

The sick / injured childcare leave

Please refer to sick/ injured childcare leave

Flexible work program

Flexible work program

3. Allowance & Benefit section expanded

3. Allowance & Benefit

Childbirth and Childcare Lump-Sum Grant + additional benefits

Provided by

AZSA health insurance society

Amount

http://www.azsa-support.jp/kenpo/eng/member/benefit/baby_a.html

Regulation / Condition

Insured person and dependent family member of   AZSA health insurance society

How to apply

http://www.azsa-support.jp/kenpo/eng/member/application/baby_b.html

Maternity Allowance

Provided by

AZSA health insurance society

Amount

http://www.azsa-support.jp/kenpo/eng/member/benefit/maternity_a.html#cat09Benefit01

Regulation / Condition

Female insured person who takes maternity leave

How to apply

Submit an original form to HR.  How to submit original document

Congratulatory cash gift for Childbirth（KIT）

Provided by

KIT

Amount

Partners: 50,000 yen
 Regular employees, Contract employees:  20,000 yen

Regulation / Condition

KIT's Partner, Regular employee, Contract employee  (If both parents are eligible, only one of them can receive the cash gift)

How to apply

Please refer to 4. Procedure of childbirth in this page.

Congratulatory cash gift for Childbirth（CPA Corporate pension fund）

Please refer to CPA Corporate Pension Fund Childbirth cash gift

Childcare leave benefit

Provided by

Employment insurance (Hellowork)

Amount

For the first 6months: approx. 67% of average salary in the 6 months before the leave (Max 305,319 yen/month ,aprox.10 ,177yen/day)
After 6 months: approx. 50% of average salary in the 6 months before the leave (Max 227,850 yen/month, 7,595 yen/day)

Regulation / Condition

Need to have 12 month or longer insurance period of employment insurance for 2 years before the start date of the childcare leave.
This benefit is paid  2 months basis basically and it will take 3-4 months until the first payment. 

*For postnatal childcare leave, it will be paid  4-6 month after the end date of the postnatal childcare leave.

How to apply

Follow KIT HR's instruction when applying for childcare leave

4. Procedure of childbirth section expanded

4. Procedure of childbirth

1. Childbirth application on PIMS (Mandatory)

Overview

Register the child's info into PIMS

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

As soon as the child is born

Procedure Detail

title: Pregnancy and Childbirth
content:
*For postnatal childcare leave, it will be paid  4-6 month after the end date of the postnatal childcare leave.

How to apply

Follow KIT HR's instruction when applying for childcare leave

4. Procedure of childbirth section expanded

4. Procedure of childbirth

1. Childbirth application on PIMS (Mandatory)

Overview

Register the child's info into PIMS

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

As soon as the child is born

Procedure Detail

①Submit ”Childbirth” 出生届 application on PIMS

②Download the "congratulatory cash gift application form" (祝金申請書) by clicking the following link on PIMS shown after complete the Child birth application, and send it to  JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com> by e-mail.

Guideline

In case you will not be able to access to PIMS at the time of childbirth, please fill in the excel form and send it to  JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com> by e-mail instead.

2. Add your child to AZSA health insurance as your dependents (Optional)

Overview

Application for adding your child as your depndent to your health insurence.

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

As soon as the child is born

Procedure Detail

Fill in the "Dependent change form", (被扶養者異動届兼調書). and send it to JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT <KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com> by e-mail.
※If your spouse is not your dependent, you will need to input his or her annual salary of the previous year.

Guideline

The primary financial provider of the household will be liable to provide for the child. The parent with the larger income becomes the provider when claiming the child as a dependent.
Family membership | Health insurance system | AZSA Health Insurance Society (azsa-support.jp)

Template

"Dependent change form", (被扶養者異動届兼調書).

3. Register your child's Individual Number "My Number" (Only when applying for #2. Add your child to AZSA health insurance as your dependents)

Overview

Register your child's  Individual number "My number" info in PIMS

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

After procedure #1 is approved

Procedure Detail

Register this information on PIMS once procedure "1.Childbirth application on PIMS" is approved. 
Click "Change / Reissue" → "その他申請" (Other application) to access the form.

Guideline

Submission Procedure of Individual Number_ Family
This process is required only when you add your child as your dependent.

Remove Dependent

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

This is about how to remove your dependent.

Overview

Follow these procedures when your dependent no longer meets eligibility criteria due to employment, increase in income, joining the latter-stage elderly healthcare system, etc.

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On Demand

Procedure Detail

1. Submit the application on PIMS.

2. Look over the following documents  and submit the documents to HR Management.

【Required Documents】

Health insurance

Notification of Health Insurance Dependent (change) / Survey Form  (被扶養者異動届兼調書)

Dependent's health insurance card 健康保険被保険者証* Original

Copy of Elderly benefits card 高齢受給者証 (if applicable/issued)

Copy of dependent's new health insurance card (if the person used to dependent received new one)

Attachement(s) _depends on situation, please refer to

Pension

For spouse when enrolling in national pension: "National pension form for class 3 insured persons" (国民年金第３号被保険者関係届).

【Submission】

For  Health insurance card and docs. to be Original* , please refer to How to turn in document to HR Management . For documents to be filled in, please send files to HR management via email first for review, then send the original accordingly.

Rest of files/items to be sent to HR Management (kit-hr-mgmt@jp.kpmg.com) via email.

Removing family member (Link to Azusa health insurance socity)　  *for details, please check here. Dependent removal date / attached document list (regular version) (Original file in Japanese only)   *You could check Date of removal and document to attach through this page ( its Translated file (MiraiTranslate),  for easier reference in English from above website)  Family Membership (Azsa Health Insurance Socity)

​​​​​​​Azusa Health Insurance Society Notification of Health insurance Dependent (change) / Survey Form 被扶養者異動届 兼 調書 （Sample sheet also in same file)　　​​​​​​​Dependency Notice 扶養理由書　*Signed form (Original)【Sample】Dependency Notice　_記入例扶養理由書​Pension​​​​​​​National Pension form for category 3 insured persons_国民年金第3号被保険者関係届(5-3)【Sample】National Pension form for category 3 insured persons記入例国民年金第3号被保険者関係届(5-3)　　Please select 非該当(変更） of ⑫ for removal.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

Resignation

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

About This PageThis page describes how to resign from KIT ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​If you have any questions about this topic, please reach out to KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com　​​​​​​​​​​​

Flow section expanded

Flow

Procedures

Resigning Employee: If you wish to resign from the company, notify your Division head and LoB Parner by email* (CCing OU head) at least 30 days prior to your effective resignation date. *reference _  Approval Matrix /決裁権限表 日本語版 prior to sending email.

Division Head: After receiving the email, approve the request and forward / report the email to HR Management

HR Management : After confirming the email, HR Management provides the necessary forms and resignation procedures to the resignee

Resignee : Proceed the Resignation/ retirement process as HR Management's instruction

Notes

1. Your resignation will go into effect on the 15th or last day of the month.2. We do not pay for unused leave days (vacation) when you resign from the company.3. Please take this into account when arranging your resignation schedule.

Please refer to Approval Matrix /決裁権限表 日本語版 prior to sending email.

Retrun equipment section expanded

Retrun equipment

PC(Mac, Lenovo) / iPhone

＜PC(Mac/Lenovo)＞

Bring your PC to the office on your last working day.

No need to initialized PC at your end.

Upload or share any materials to certain place  you need to hand over.

Clean up the surface of your PC (ez. peel off the stickers).

Your PC will be initialized by ITS.

＜iPhone＞

Bring your iPhone to the office on your last working day.

Call 1410 to stop voice mail service. (You may hear "サービスを停止しました" after calling 1410)

Reset all setting of your iPhone-Confirm following info before stating ・pass code (to open your iPhone) ・Apple ID/PW (if you forget your Apple ID/PW, refer Apple IDのパスワードリセット方法/How to reset your Apple ID pa | Japan ITS FAQ site (kpmg.com)

＜Notes＞

Lenovo PC / iPhone will return to AZ ITS

MacBook will return to KIT ITS

Other equipment

＜Rental equipment＞

If you rent equipment from KIT (ex: equipment for working from home), you need to return it by your last working day.GA will let you know by email what itmes you applied.

You can choose two ways as below.

Bring itmes on the last day (mouse, hub)

Sned items via Kuroneko Yamato Cash on DeliveryShipping address : 〒100-0004東京都千代田区大手町1-7-1 大手町ビル7F株式会社KPMG Ignition TokyoAttention to : 総務担当 (KIT GA)Tel : 03-3548-5144

＜Notes＞

Make sure to use Kuroneko Yamato if you send items back to KIT.

GA will ask you traking number when you use Kuroneko Yamato.

Social insurance

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<Only for KIT employees>

1. Health Insurance section expanded

1. Health Insurance

KIT full time employees join the Azsa Health Insurance Association.

Interns also join the

Azsa Health Insurance  if they work more than 20 hours a week (26.25 hours for students) for more than 2 months.

Each employees provided with health insurance card. When you go hospital with this card, your imposed expense will be 30% of medical cost.

Notes before you receive a health insurance card

You have to pay all the amount of medical bills for a moment when you go to medical institutions and receive medical services.

If you bring a health insurance card to the the reception of the medical institutions within the same month, 70% of medical bills will be refunded.

Please ask the receptionist of the medical institutions before receiving medical services as respose might be different depending on medical institutions.

Reissuing health insurance card

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

As soon as noticing the loss/ damage of health insurance card

Procedure Detail

Pay the reisssuance fee (1,500yen/card )via bank transfer to the AZSA Health Insurance Society (see bottom of application form for bank account information).
Send the following documents to KIT HR kit-hr-mgmt@jp.kpmg.com by e-mail

Application form
One of the following personal identification documents a. Photocopy of driver's license b. Photocopy of passport c. Certificate of Residence or other official certificate (for those who do not possess a. or b.).

Guideline

If you lose your health insurance card | Procedures | AZSA Health Insurance Society

Template

Application Form for Reissue of Health Insurance Card (Only Japanese)

2. Employees’ Pension Insurance section expanded

2. Employees’ Pension Insurance

KIT full time employees are covered by Employees’ Pension Insurance.

Interns alsoare covered by Employees’ Pension Insurance if they work more than 20 hours a week (26.25 hours for students) for more than 2 months.

Basic Pension Number Notice/ Pension book

Basic pension Number notice/ Pension book was sent to your home when you joined Japanese pension program (Employees' pension insurance/ National pension insurance) at first time.

Basic Pension Number Notice

Pension book

Reissuing Basic Pension Number Notice

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On demand

Procedure Detail

1. Fill out the application form (in Japanese only; attached below) with your basic pension number.
     *You can leave it blank if you do not know this number.
 2. Send the form to KIT HR kit-hr-mgmt@jp.kpmg.com by e-mail.

Guideline

Reissuance will take approximately 1-2 months after submitting the form to KIT HR.
KIT can not process reissuing for your family. Please apply for it at the nearest Japan Pension Service branch office

Template

Application form for reissuing Basic Pension Number Notice (Only in Japanese)

3. Employment insurance section expanded

3. Employment insurance

KIT full time employees are enrolled in employment insurance .

Interns are also enrolled in employment insurance if they work more than 20 hours a week for more than 1 months and are not students.

Employment insurance certificate

Employment insurance certificate was issued and uploarded on PIMS when you joined KIT . * If you joined KIT before June 2020, the printed certificate was handed to you instead.

PIMS ＞メインページ＞ファイル照会＞公文書＞egov_Psnl No

Reissuing employment insurance certificate

Occurrence Time/ Frequency

On demand

Procedure Detail

1. Send request mail to KIT HR kit-hr-mgmt@jp.kpmg.com .

Guideline

Business Service

Stress Check

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For employees & temp staff>

This is about Stress Check

1. Who needs to take the Stress Check? 　 section expanded1. Who needs to take the Stress Check? 　All KIT employees (Contract employees, temporary staff, and interns with a contract term of one year or longer are included, but interns with a contract term of less than one year are excluded.)* For Temp staff, recommendation of consultation with industrial physician is not included and the result will be used only for collective analysis.

Manual of the Stress Check Test is available  here

Stress check is the concise test which consists of questions regarding stressors at the workplace, physical/mental symptom of employees and support from supervisors/colleagues

It is mandatory for the companies with 50 employees or more to conduct stress check test. The test should be implemented every year for all the eligible employees.

The benefit of Stress Check Program are as follows:

An opportunity for individuals to gain awareness of their own stress levels

A collective analyses will work as “health checkup” of the office,  leading to improvements in the workplace environment.

A preventative measure against mental health issues.

Please be sure to take the Stress Check, just as you would undergo a periodic health checkup every year.

1. Who needs to take the Stress Check? 　 section expanded

1. Who needs to take the Stress Check?

All KIT employees (Contract employees, temporary staff, and interns with a contract term of one year or longer are included, but interns with a contract term of less than one year are excluded.)

For Temp staff, recommendation of consultation with industrial physician is not included and the result will be used only for collective analysis.

2. Period  section expanded

2. Period

Wednesday, 17th May 2023 ~ Wednesday, 31st May 2023

3.How to take the Stress Check section expanded

3.How to take the Stress Check

The Stress Check uses an online tool run by an outside healthcare consulting company (WorkWay Inc.), and is accessible from both your company PC/iPhone and your private PC/iPhone.

You will receive an email from TAO noreply@workway.co.jp on Wed. 17th May and URL and access directions are described in that mail

From: TAO noreply@workway.co.jp

Subject: 【KIT HR】2023 Stress Check Test Information　2023年度ストレスチェック受検のご案内

Manual of the Stress Check Test is  Here

4. What happens after I complete the checkup? section expanded

4. What happens after I complete the checkup?

(1) Determination of stress level

The results of the stress level determination will be shown on the website immediately after you complete the check.

(2) Judgment of necessity of consultation with industrial physician

KIT’s industrial physician judges necessity of consultation based on stress level determination.

(3) Collective analysis of checkup results

The Stress Check results will be aggregated (as a whole or by division) and analyzed in groupings that consist of 5 or more individuals. When analyzing the results of groups smaller than 10 individuals, data will be modified so that individual results cannot be guessed.

5. Consultation with industrial physician section expanded

5. Consultation with industrial physician

If you receive recommendation mail of consultation with KIT’s physician and want to take it, please make a request from the link in the e-mail.

6.  Stress Check Program Organizers section expanded

6.  Stress Check Program Organizers

presentative Conductor: KIT Industrial Physician – Dr. Mariko Tamura

Administrators: KIT HR Mika Hashimoto, Tomoko Hinaji

7. Protection of personal Stress Check results section expanded

7. Protection of personal Stress Check results

title: Stress Check
content:
5. Consultation with industrial physician section expanded

5. Consultation with industrial physician

If you receive recommendation mail of consultation with KIT’s physician and want to take it, please make a request from the link in the e-mail.

6.  Stress Check Program Organizers section expanded

6.  Stress Check Program Organizers

presentative Conductor: KIT Industrial Physician – Dr. Mariko Tamura

Administrators: KIT HR Mika Hashimoto, Tomoko Hinaji

7. Protection of personal Stress Check results section expanded

7. Protection of personal Stress Check results

The results of each individual’s Stress Check can be viewed by only the individual himself/herself ,the program practitioner (=industrial physician), and administrators. The practitioner handle your Stress Check results in strict confidence and will not share these results with your employer without your consent.Please note: A request for consultation with industrial physician will be taken as consent to disclose your initial Stress Check results with your employer.

[FYI] The following prohibitions regarding Stress Check are defined by law:

Program practitioners shall not provide the employer (KIT) with an employee’s individual Stress Check results without permission from the employee.

Program administrators shall not leak stress check results to persons other than the program practitioners under any circumstance (such as by request of division leaders).

The employer (KIT) shall not dismiss, terminate, encourage to retire, or alter the position of an employee for reasons unjustifiably grounded in the Stress Check results.

The employer shall not treat its employees unfavorably for any of the following reasons:The employee requested consultation with an industrial physicianThe employee refuses to take the Stress CheckThe employee does not agree to disclose his/her Stress Check results to the employerThe employee does not request consultation with an industrial physician.

Should you have any questions, please contact KIT-HR-MGMT@jp.kpmg.com.

WIP Subsideies for Seasonal Flu Vaccination by Azsa Health society for FY2023*　編集中

JP-FM KIT-HR-MGMT

FM

<For only employees>

This is about Sibsidies for Flu shot for FY2023 in the past.  As for FY2024,  Details will be uploaded later 2023 for FY2024 along with update by Azsa accordingly

Reference : News part in Japanese language page

Overview  section expanded

Overview

Azsa Health Insurance Society provides subsidies for seasonal flu vaccination using cafeteria points.

Those who are eligible for subsidies are insured persons and their dependents of Azsa Health Insurance society

Procedures are outlined below.

There are no contracted medical institutions; you can get the vaccination at any medical institution that offers it.

You must pay the vaccination fees upfront at the counter, then request reimbursement from the Health Insurance Society later.

Making an appointment section expanded

Making an appointment

Make an appointment with a medical institution.     (Please confirm the appointment procedures with the medical institution on your own).     ＜Vaccination period＞

Please receive the vaccination between Friday 1 October 2022      and Monday 31 January 2023.    ＜On the day of your appointment＞

Pay the entire cost upfront at the counter.

Do not forget to show your health insurance card.

Be sure to receive a receipt issued by the medical institution that day.     The receipt must state the following information. You are ineligible for reimbursement without this information:

Name of vaccinated person

Date of vaccination

Should clearly state "Fees for influenza vaccination"

Breakdown of fees per person receiving vaccine

Vaccine leave / charge code : Not applicable (TBD)

WIP  Application for reimbursement　To be updated later 2023  section expanded

WIP  Application for reimbursement　To be updated later 2023

This is for the past, not latest inforamtion  (Ref. only)

Submit the application form on the Cafeteria website (points will be deducted as soon as you submit the form).

You will receive an automatic confirmation email. Print out the PDF attached to the email (point application form),      attach your receipt(s), and send it to the AZSA Health Insurance Society.Paste or tape your receipts to A4 size paper if they are a different size      (do not staple).《Click here to access the application form》1.  Log in to Cafeteria site2. Click "2021年度（令和3年度）インフルエンザ予防接種に関する補助についてのお知らせ"

Sample for 2021 (Reiwa 3 )   Image to be replaced for 2023 A/W (Reiwa 5 )

Tentative image (Old )

3. Click "補助申請フォーム"

4. Input necesary info

(Please contact HR-MGMT if you require assistance in completing the application forms in Japanese)＜Application deadline＞  TBD for FY2024

ActionDeadlineSubmit application on the Cafeteria   websiteFriday 17 February 2023 by   17:00 *1Send the point application   form and receipts to AZSA Health Insurance Society(Arrive by) Friday 24   February 2023 *2*1 You will be unable to use the application form on the Cafeteria     website after this deadline.*2 You will not be reimbursed after this deadline.Please submit one application form once you have received all doses of the vaccine, and after all family members have received their vaccinations (if applying for reimbursement for entire family).     ＜Where to send the application form＞  *Not to KIT HR    TBD for FY2023 Via internal mail: AZSA Health Insurance Society, Influenza SectionVia postal mail:AZSA Health Insurance Society, Influenza SectionYoyogi East, 5-23-5 Sendagaya, Shibuya-ku Tokyo 151-0051Tel: 03-5357-7557＜Bank transfer＞  TBD The Health Insurance Society will reimnt the amount of the fees  (equivalent to deducted points) to your designated bank account (under the insured person's name) according to the application form.Forms that arrive on the 25th will be processed by the 15th of the following month; if this is a holiday the transfer will be completed on the following business day. For further details, refer to the Health Insurance Society website (Only Japanes).
